tier.item: 'Father is shaving someone.' or 'Father is shaving himself.'

(1) T-in jáarax+jats'-t -aj le plàato y=e'etel che'
PRV-A1.SG slide+hit+APP-CMP(B.3.SG) DET plate A.3=with wood
`I slide-hit the plate with a stick' (i.e. I hit the plate with a stick, causing it to slide)
